name: Geometry Runner
description:
The goal of the game is simple - type as many points as possible. Overcome obstacles, raise your score and compete with other players. Random level generation and increasing complexity over time will not let you get bored!

Features:

  • Simple control
  • Random level generation
  • Increasing complexity over time
  • Achievements and leaderboard

PS: this is my first game, do not judge strictly :)
